name: The Pumpkin Curse
description:
A cute, flying, sidescrolling, shooter with evil pumpkins, a moon witch, and super potions!

After a curse was placed on the Moon Witch, her pumpkin servants suddenly turned against her, attacking her as she tries to find the entity behind all of this chaos. Fly through the night, power up with potions, and try to defeat as many of your evil servants as possible!

CONTROLS:

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys

Shoot - Space

Start - Space

Pause - P
